title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 95.6 - Germination standards for flower seed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 95.6 - Germination standards for flower seed

State Regulations
(a) Germination standards for flower seed
including hard seed, as specified in section
137
of the Agriculture and Markets Law, shall be those indicated below: Kind

(b) A mixture of kinds of flower seeds will be considered to be below standard if
the germination of any kind or combination of kinds constituting 25 per cent or
more of the mixture by number is below standard for the kind or kinds
involved. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
95.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
